question: Which Gothic-style church in Cēsis, Latvia, was consecrated in 1284?
asked_question_translated: Milline gooti stiilis kirik Lätis, Cēsis, pühitseti 1284. aastal?
answer: Lätis, Cēsises gooti stiilis kirik, mis pühitseti 1284. aastal, on Püha Jāņa kirik.
answer_translated_eng: The Gothic church in Cēsis, Latvia, consecrated in 1284, is the Church of St Jāņa.
